component.name: Roku_Youi_Scene
component.script:
sub init() 'm.top.backgroundURI = "pkg:/images/purplebg.jpg" m.top.id = "Roku_Youi_Scene" m.label = m.top.findNode("Label") m.keyinput = "none" end sub
function onKeyEvent(key as String, press as Boolean) as Boolean handled = true print "Roku_Youi_Scene Processing event..." + key if(press) m.global.key = key else m.global.key = "none" end if
return handled end function
